result.execSummary:
The defendant Donald Lucas Jones was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery by Prisoners [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.20(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
To be served within the confines of the Wisconsin Prison System
Consecutive to: to sentence currently serving

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Donald  Lucas Jones in court, in custody with attorney Annamarie Amy Wineke.  Yolanda J. Tienstra appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State heard on sentencing recomendation.  Atty Wineke responds.  Def makes stmt.  Court heard and imposes sentence as follows:

9 mos DCJ w/h&t consec. to any sentence previously imposed - court will allow def to serve in DCJ, however, may be required to serve in prison
Writ
Writ

ADDRESS INFO for Donald Lucas Jones
Current: PO Box 700, c/o DCI, Waupun, WI 53963-0700 United States  (Effective: 06-10-2015)
Prior: 116 W. Washington Avenue, Madison, WI 53719
Sentencing hearing at 07-30-2015 01:30 pm

Attorney Annamarie Amy Wineke appeared. ADA Thompson appears for State. Defendant does not appear; in DCI - no writ done. Court reschedules hearing. Writ to be done.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for July 30, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
State

14CF373 & 15CF51: Defendant Donald Lucas Jones in court, in custody with attorney Annamarie Amy Wineke.  Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. Wineke heard - requests later date for sentencing, just plea today as Def. being revoked on another case and needs to be sentenced on that first; Sent. set 60 days out 6/10/15 at 9:00am; victim rights compliance; Court reviews GPQPA & WOR; Court reviews charges/penalties; State files Information today; Def. pleads NC to Battery by Prisoner in 15CF51; Court finds plea made FVK&I and finds Def. guilty of Battery by Prisoner in 15CF51 and in 14CF373, Counts 1 and 3 are D&RI and Count 2 is dismissed; notices distributed; Def. remanded
Sentencing hearing on June 10, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Review hearing on March 25, 2015 at 08:15 am.

State of Wisconsin apprs by Atty Bob Barrington.  DEF, Donald Jones apprs in person; in custody.  DEF states he has Atty Annamarie Wineke.  Court calls Atty Wineke to confirm.  Atty Wineke will contact DEF regarding this case.  Resets Review Hearing.
Plea/sentencing hearing on March 23, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with alleged victim.   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.

9:16 - Defendant Donald Lucas Jones in court, in custody.  Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges, penalties and right to Preliminary Hearing. Court finds probable cause. Prelim requested, waiving time limits. Prelim & Review set. Court sets $1000 Cash bond with conditions:   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.    Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with victim.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Review hearing scheduled for March 11, 2015 at 08:15 am.
